responsibilities: Participate in the design and development of complex, scalable software solutions across the full manufacturing test framework stack.
Design and implement robust front-end interfaces using Angular.
Develop and maintain highly available back-end services and APIs using Python and Java.
Design and manage relational databases, primarily MySQL.
Design, implement, and maintain DevOps pipelines to automate the build, test, and deployment processes.
Use Ansible to automate deployment of full stack configurations.
Implement and manage Docker container services.
Configure and maintain Linux-based virtual machines and environments.
Optimize application performance and scalability in a manufacturing context.
Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation for software, systems, and processes.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, manufacturing engineers, and quality assurance personnel, to ensure alignment on testing requirements and quality standards.
Stay updated on the latest advancements in testing technologies, methodologies, and industry best practices.
Contribute to the end-to-end architecture, definition, development, and production deployment of production software applications and infrastructure.
Interface with internal engineering, manufacturing, and quality teams and end customers to ensure software deliverables meet rigorous standards.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on software development, DevOps, and system management, particularly in a manufacturing context. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them. The responsibilities are more aligned with traditional software engineering and infrastructure management rather than AI or machine learning tasks.
